artist: Artist: Eliot K. Daughtry; Publisher: Eliot K. Daughtry , Oakland, Calif.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, photomechanical illustration of robot-figure, with letterpress text and designs, printed in color offset lithography on decal adhered to hardcover case binding; 85 pp.
inscription: Title page, black ink pen: FLY- THank You! (illeg. signiture)
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Robots: A Practical Taxonomy
